description.value: Irori challenges you to adapt to adversity in order to perfect yourself. You become weighed down as if under heavy weights, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Encumbered] until you accomplish a challenging task of Irori's choosing.
